dailyEvents.name: Sunny
dailyEvents.description: Sunny appears on Route 37 every Sunday and gives you a Magnet.

dailyEvents.name: Monica
dailyEvents.description: Monica appears on Route 40 every Monday and gives you a Sharp Beak.

dailyEvents.name: Tuscany
dailyEvents.description: Tuscany appears on Route 29 every Tuesday and gives you a Silk Scarf.

dailyEvents.name: Wesley
dailyEvents.description: Wesley appears at the Lake of Rage every Wednesday and gives you a Black Belt.

dailyEvents.name: Arthur
dailyEvents.description: Arthur appears on Route 36 every Thursday and gives you a Hard Stone.

dailyEvents.name: Frieda
dailyEvents.description: Frieda appears on Route 32 every Friday and gives you a Poison Barb.

dailyEvents.name: Santos
dailyEvents.description: Santos appears in Blackthorn City every Saturday and gives you a Spell Tag.

weeklyEvents.name: Lapras
weeklyEvents.description: A wild Lapras appears in the basement of Union Cave every Friday. It can be battled and caught.

weeklyEvents.name: Bug Catching Contest
weeklyEvents.description: The Bug Catching Contest is held at National Park on Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays. Compete to catch the best Bug-type Pokémon!

weeklyEvents.name: S.S. Aqua
weeklyEvents.description: The S.S. Aqua departs from Olivine Port on Mondays and Fridays, traveling between Johto and Kanto.

weeklyEvents.name: Older Haircut Brother
weeklyEvents.description: The older haircut brother works on Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays for ¥500. He has a higher chance of making your Pokémon much happier.

weeklyEvents.name: Younger Haircut Brother
weeklyEvents.description: The younger haircut brother works on Sundays, Wednesdays, and Fridays for ¥300. He has more variable results but costs less.

weeklyEvents.name: Bargain Merchant
weeklyEvents.description: The Bargain Merchant appears on Monday mornings only in the Goldenrod Underground, selling items at discounted prices.

weeklyEvents.name: Bitter Merchant
weeklyEvents.description: The Bitter Merchant appears on weekends (Saturday and Sunday) in the Goldenrod Underground, selling bitter herbs that heal Pokémon but reduce happiness.
